com.indra.iquality.helper

Class DataHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.indra.iquality.helper.DataHelper

  • public class DataHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DataHelper. Provides a set of auxiliary methods related to data filtering and conversion needed for the DAOs.
    Version:
    0.5, 16-dic-2015 The Class DataHelper.
    Author:
    Ignacio N. Lucero Ascencio

      Filters a string in case it is null.

    • Method Detail

      • conceptTypeStringToEnum

        public ConceptTypeEnum conceptTypeStringToEnum(java.lang.String type)
        Converts a String to its equivalent representation as one of the concept type defined in the system, if possible.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the concept
        Returns:
        the concept translated to the system representation, or the default "unknown" value if no possible translation.
        See Also:
        ConceptTypeEnum

      • filterStringToSqlDate

        public java.sql.Date filterStringToSqlDate(java.lang.String tmstmp)
                                    throws java.text.ParseException
        Translates a String representation of a timestamp to an SQLDate.
        Parameters:
        tmstmp - the timestamp
        Returns:
        the parsed date, or the default date defined in the Environment for a null String
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if the String was not formatted as a timestamp

      • filterNullString

        public java.lang.String filterNullString(java.lang.String s)
        Filters a string in case it is null.
        Parameters:
        s - the String
        Returns:
        if the String is null or holds the value "null", returns the default Environment definition for a null String. Otherwise, returns the input parameter.

      • filterStringToInt

        public int filterStringToInt(java.lang.String s)
        Filters a string in case it is null an returns its representation as an integer.
        Parameters:
        s - the String
        Returns:
        if the String is null or holds the value "null", returns the default Environment definition for a null integer. Otherwise, returns the integer representation of the input parameter.

      • filterStringToDouble

        public double filterStringToDouble(java.lang.String s)
        Filters a string in case it is null an returns its representation as a double.
        Parameters:
        s - the String
        Returns:
        if the String is null or holds the value "null", returns the default Environment definition for a null double. Otherwise, returns the double representation of the input parameter.
